evidence.text: Person A: I'll tell you- we are not going back inside until you look us in the eye and you tell us where you are willing to compromise?!

Person A: Jim. Listen to me.
Person A: Everything we see that is ugly- stupid, cruel, and ugly. Everything is your fault.
Person A: Taking a moment to fully digest the severity of LASZLO's sentiment, JIM SIMPSON replies with a violent push causing LASZLO to slip and fall in the mud.
Person A: Honey, have I introduced you to Jim Simpson? Jim is the boss' lap dog and Architectural Consultant Extraordinaire! He designed a hotel in Stamford.
